bridge.toolkit.commands
Class SCOBuilder

java.lang.Object
  bridge.toolkit.commands.SCOBuilder
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.commons.chain.Command
public class SCOBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.apache.commons.chain.Command

Builds the launchable learning resources (SCOs) from the DMs found in the SCPM.

Field Summary
(package private)  java.util.List<java.lang.String> commonFiles
          List of Strings that represent the file found in the Viewer Application directory.

          File that represents the location of the content package directory.
(package private)  java.lang.String CPSTYLESHEET
          SCORM CP XSLT StyleSheet to be applied to the data modules
(package private)  DMParser dmp
          Provides a way to parse S1000D files and to find data model codes.
(package private)  org.jdom.Document manifest
          JDOM Document that is used for the imsmanifest.xml file.
(package private)  java.lang.String SCOBUILDER_FAILED
          Message that is returned if the building of the SCOs is unsuccessful.
(package private)  org.jdom.Document scpm
          JDOM Document that is used for the S1000D SCPM file.

private  void generateLaunchableFile()
          Generates a unique htm file for each 'resource' element that has scormType = 'sco' found in the imsmanifest.xml file and applies the unique htm file name to the 'href' values for each of the SCO 'resource' elements.

listViewerAppFiles

private void listViewerAppFiles(java.io.File srcFolder)
Adds all of the Viewer Application files to a List that will be used to generate a common 'resource' element to be added to the imsmanifest.xml file.

Parameters:
srcFolder - File object that represents the location of the Viewer Application files in the content package.

generateCommonResource

private void generateCommonResource()
                             throws org.jdom.JDOMException
Generates a common 'resource' element that contains all of the files in the View Application and adds a dependency element for the RES-common-files to all resource elements that have scormType = 'sco'.

Throws:
org.jdom.JDOMException

findSCOResources

private java.util.Iterator<org.jdom.Element> findSCOResources()
                                                       throws org.jdom.JDOMException
Searches through the imsmanifest.xml file for all of the 'resource' elements that have scormType = 'sco'.

Returns:
Iterator Iterator of JDOM Elements that are 'resource' elements with scormType = 'sco'.
Throws:
org.jdom.JDOMException

generateLaunchableFile

private void generateLaunchableFile()
                             throws org.jdom.JDOMException,
                                    java.io.IOException
Generates a unique htm file for each 'resource' element that has scormType = 'sco' found in the imsmanifest.xml file and applies the unique htm file name to the 'href' values for each of the SCO 'resource' elements.

Throws:
org.jdom.JDOMException
java.io.IOException
